column1: Little Goat Diner////I love you Stephanie Izard! You are truly a master of cooking. You've changed the game and have fun being you. The menu here is a take on diner foods taking to another level. With an awesome playlist of music playing you can't help but sing along. 90s-Early 2000s songs of hip hop
column3: and dance. Little Goat breaths fresh air into the culinary world.
